texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Outsourcing Contract on Development of Miaoli Royal Resort Hotel
texts.text: Outsourcing Contract on Development of Miaoli Royal Resort Hotel

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Covenanter: The HUANG JIA Country CLUB and Recreation Inc. (hereinafter referred to as Party A) and the Covenanter: Chang ChenBin Architects Office (hereinafter referred to as Party B) hereby agree to establish the following terms and conditions with regard to the development of Miaoli Royal Resort Hotel:
texts.text: The Covenanter: The HUANG JIA Country CLUB and Recreation Inc. (hereinafter referred to as Party A) and the Covenanter: Chang ChenBin Architects Office (hereinafter referred to as Party B) hereby agree to establish the following terms and conditions with regard to the development of Miaoli Royal Resort Hotel:

texts.text: Article II. Project Range

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The base of the project is located on Lot No. 19 and so on in the Section of Laotianliao, Touwu Township, Miaoli County (refer to the attached map for more details) with an area about 29 hectares.
texts.text: The base of the project is located on Lot No. 19 and so on in the Section of Laotianliao, Touwu Township, Miaoli County (refer to the attached map for more details) with an area about 29 hectares.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article IV. Service Fee
texts.text: Article IV. Service Fee

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The fees for services mentioned in Part I to Part VI are NTD 12 million ((SAY TWELVE MILLION ONLY) in total and the fees for planning and design of the buildings and construction monitoring shall be calculated based on the ratio of 3.50% of the legal construction cost hereof.
texts.text: The fees for services mentioned in Part I to Part VI are NTD 12 million ((SAY TWELVE MILLION ONLY) in total and the fees for planning and design of the buildings and construction monitoring shall be calculated based on the ratio of 3.50% of the legal construction cost hereof.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Should Party A require a comprehensive modification on the development plan of the project outsourced and any subsequent extra cost occur in Party B; Party A shall bear the corresponding extra service fee.
texts.text: Should Party A require a comprehensive modification on the development plan of the project outsourced and any subsequent extra cost occur in Party B; Party A shall bear the corresponding extra service fee.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article V. Payment Method
texts.text: Article V. Payment Method

texts.label: text
texts.orig: With regard to the payment method regarding the project herein, Party A shall remit relevant cashes into the account designated by Party B by stages as per the following conditions:
texts.text: With regard to the payment method regarding the project herein, Party A shall remit relevant cashes into the account designated by Party B by stages as per the following conditions:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Stage 1: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid upon signing of the Contract herein.
texts.text: Stage 1: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid upon signing of the Contract herein.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Stage 2: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid upon completion of the Business Plan and Architectural Development Plan and Relevant Drawings.
texts.text: Stage 2: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid upon completion of the Business Plan and Architectural Development Plan and Relevant Drawings.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Stage 3: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid after the soil and water conservation plan and relevant drawings are filed in the county government.
texts.text: Stage 3: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid after the soil and water conservation plan and relevant drawings are filed in the county government.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Stage 4: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid after the Environmental Impact Assessment Report and relevant drawings are filed in the county government.
texts.text: Stage 4: The service fee of NTD 1.2 million (SAY ONE MILLION AND TWENTY THOUSAND ONLY) shall be paid after the Environmental Impact Assessment Report and relevant drawings are filed in the county government.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: IMPERIAL GARDEN & RESORT, INC., DRS (on F-1), 10/28/2016
texts.text: Source: IMPERIAL GARDEN & RESORT, INC., DRS (on F-1), 10/28/2016

texts.label: text
texts.orig: In case the Contract cannot be performed due to any reason other than the architect herein, the client agrees the fees paid will not be refunded. In case the Contract cannot be performed due to the architect herein, the architect shall refund the fees paid in full without taking any interest to the client.
texts.text: In case the Contract cannot be performed due to any reason other than the architect herein, the client agrees the fees paid will not be refunded. In case the Contract cannot be performed due to the architect herein, the architect shall refund the fees paid in full without taking any interest to the client.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article VI. Exclusions
texts.text: Article VI. Exclusions

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The service fee shall not include the fees for land measurement and boundary identification, geological drilling, meeting relevant land administration regulations, air pollution prevention, meeting relevant construction regulations, security system monitoring, scrivener service, deposit of soil and water conservation, review of the competent authority, attendance of concerned experts and scholars and meeting relevant administrative regulations.
texts.text: The service fee shall not include the fees for land measurement and boundary identification, geological drilling, meeting relevant land administration regulations, air pollution prevention, meeting relevant construction regulations, security system monitoring, scrivener service, deposit of soil and water conservation, review of the competent authority, attendance of concerned experts and scholars and meeting relevant administrative regulations.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article VII. Term Planned
texts.text: Article VII. Term Planned

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Party B shall make the most economical and effective arrangement for Party A with respect to the project based on the principle of alignment with the plan progress of Party A. The term planned is stated as following:
texts.text: Party B shall make the most economical and effective arrangement for Party A with respect to the project based on the principle of alignment with the plan progress of Party A. The term planned is stated as following:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: I. Topographic survey and measurement, geological drilling and program evaluation (about 1.0 months);
texts.text: I. Topographic survey and measurement, geological drilling and program evaluation (about 1.0 months);

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: II. Establishment of architectural development plan and business plan (about 2.0 months);
texts.text: II. Establishment of architectural development plan and business plan (about 2.0 months);

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: III. Development of soil and water conservation plan (about 2.0 months);
texts.text: III. Development of soil and water conservation plan (about 2.0 months);

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: IV. Establishment of environmental impact assessment report (about 8.0 months);
texts.text: IV. Establishment of environmental impact assessment report (about 8.0 months);

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: V. Review of development plan (containing soil and water conservation plan and environmental impact assessment report) (about 4 - 6 months);
texts.text: V. Review of development plan (containing soil and water conservation plan and environmental impact assessment report) (about 4 - 6 months);

texts.orig: Source: IMPERIAL GARDEN & RESORT, INC., DRS (on F-1), 10/28/2016
texts.text: Source: IMPERIAL GARDEN & RESORT, INC., DRS (on F-1), 10/28/2016

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: VI. Miscellaneous works review (about 2 - 4 months);
texts.text: VI. Miscellaneous works review (about 2 - 4 months);

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: VII. Change of usage zoning and category of the land (about 2 - 4 months);
texts.text: VII. Change of usage zoning and category of the land (about 2 - 4 months);

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: VIII. Application for miscellaneous license (about 1.0 month)
texts.text: VIII. Application for miscellaneous license (about 1.0 month)

texts.orig: IX. Application for construction license (including review on green construction materials and barrier-free facilities) (about 1.0 month)
texts.text: IX. Application for construction license (including review on green construction materials and barrier-free facilities) (about 1.0 month)

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article VIII. Duties of Party A
texts.text: Article VIII. Duties of Party A

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Party A shall provide the following data during the term mentioned above:
texts.text: Party A shall provide the following data during the term mentioned above:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: I. Data of rights relevant to the land.
texts.text: I. Data of rights relevant to the land.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: II. Data required by Party B and can be provided by Party A.
texts.text: II. Data required by Party B and can be provided by Party A.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (I) Basic data that must be provided in accordance with relevant regulations:
texts.text: (I) Basic data that must be provided in accordance with relevant regulations:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Name and business address of the developer;
texts.text: 1. Name and business address of the developer;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Full name, address and ID card number of the person in charge;
texts.text: 2. Full name, address and ID card number of the person in charge;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Purpose and content of the development.
texts.text: 3. Purpose and content of the development.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article IX. Duties of Party B
texts.text: Article IX. Duties of Party B

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: I. Party B shall follow all instructions of Party A and ensure all plans and designs of the project to meet relevant construction laws and regulations.
texts.text: I. Party B shall follow all instructions of Party A and ensure all plans and designs of the project to meet relevant construction laws and regulations.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: II. Party B shall take on a professional attitude for various services mentioned in Article III of the Contract, maintain benefits and interests of Party A all the time and adopt the most economical option under the precondition of safety and reliability.
texts.text: II. Party B shall take on a professional attitude for various services mentioned in Article III of the Contract, maintain benefits and interests of Party A all the time and adopt the most economical option under the precondition of safety and reliability.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: III. Party B is obligatory to report the latest progress and completed content to Party A.
texts.text: III. Party B is obligatory to report the latest progress and completed content to Party A.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article X. Special Terms
texts.text: Article X. Special Terms

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: I. With regard to the payment of all fees for professional services, the person appointed shall designate relevant professional institutions and pay the fees directly to them and the service fees due will be deducted after the payment foregoing is made.
texts.text: I. With regard to the payment of all fees for professional services, the person appointed shall designate relevant professional institutions and pay the fees directly to them and the service fees due will be deducted after the payment foregoing is made.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: II. Any other items not specified in the Contract may be negotiated and formulated by the both Parties herein separately.
texts.text: II. Any other items not specified in the Contract may be negotiated and formulated by the both Parties herein separately.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: IMPERIAL GARDEN & RESORT, INC., DRS (on F-1), 10/28/2016
texts.text: Source: IMPERIAL GARDEN & RESORT, INC., DRS (on F-1), 10/28/2016

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article XI. Disputes Resolving
texts.text: Article XI. Disputes Resolving

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Both parties herein agree to resolve any dispute regarding interpretation of the Contract in the following methods:
texts.text: Both parties herein agree to resolve any dispute regarding interpretation of the Contract in the following methods:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: I. Should both Parties be unable to reach an agreement within one month through negotiation, they may apply for an arbitration in Miaoli County and the arbitration result shall be compulsory.
texts.text: I. Should both Parties be unable to reach an agreement within one month through negotiation, they may apply for an arbitration in Miaoli County and the arbitration result shall be compulsory.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: II. Should either Party herein initiate a legal proceeding for revoking any arbitration result regarding the Contract, both Parties herein agree to take the Miaoli District Court of Taiwan as the competent court of first instance pursuant to the laws of the R.O.C..
texts.text: II. Should either Party herein initiate a legal proceeding for revoking any arbitration result regarding the Contract, both Parties herein agree to take the Miaoli District Court of Taiwan as the competent court of first instance pursuant to the laws of the R.O.C..

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Article XII. The Contract shall be made in duplicate and Party A and Party B shall hold a copy respectively in witness thereof.
texts.text: Article XII. The Contract shall be made in duplicate and Party A and Party B shall hold a copy respectively in witness thereof.

table_cells.text: The service fee of NTD 1 million (SAY ONE MILLION ONLY) shall be paid after the Environmental Impact Assessment Report is adopted.
The service fee of NTD 3 million (SAY THREE MILLION ONLY) shall be paid after the Development Plan is adopted.
The service fee of NTD 1 million (SAY ONE MILLION ONLY) shall be paid after change of the non-urban land usage is completed.

The service fee that is 3.00% of the legal construction cost shall be paid after documents and drawings for applying for the construction license of relevant buildings and the application is submitted to the competent authority.
The service fee that is 0.5% of the legal construction cost shall be paid upon submitting the construction starting application to the competent authority.
The final service fee shall be paid in a lump sum upon the completion of the structure of relevant buildings and submitting the usage license application to the competent authority.

grid.text: The service fee of NTD 1 million (SAY ONE MILLION ONLY) shall be paid after the Environmental Impact Assessment Report is adopted.
The service fee of NTD 3 million (SAY THREE MILLION ONLY) shall be paid after the Development Plan is adopted.
The service fee of NTD 1 million (SAY ONE MILLION ONLY) shall be paid after change of the non-urban land usage is completed.

The service fee that is 3.00% of the legal construction cost shall be paid after documents and drawings for applying for the construction license of relevant buildings and the application is submitted to the competent authority.
The service fee that is 0.5% of the legal construction cost shall be paid upon submitting the construction starting application to the competent authority.
The final service fee shall be paid in a lump sum upon the completion of the structure of relevant buildings and submitting the usage license application to the competent authority.
